alert.note: Alert for Faulkner (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:09PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Van Buren, northeastern Conway and northwestern Faulkner Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 408 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whipple, or 9 miles south of Clinton, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Damascus... Twin Groves... Fairbanks... Mallet Town... Whipple... Fairfield Bay Marina... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Claude... Catholic Point... Choctaw... Bee Branch... Beverage Town... Austin in Conway County... Southside in Van Buren County... Morganton... Martinville... Culpepper... Formosa... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
